description: This Java source file defines a Spring Configuration class that sets up OpenAPI documentation for the Product Management API, including metadata like title, description, version, contact info, and external documentation link.

classes.name: OpenApiConfig
classes.description: Spring configuration class that provides a bean for OpenAPI documentation setup.

methods.name: productApiOpenAPI
methods.description: Creates and returns an OpenAPI object with API metadata, contact info, and external documentation link.
